agents.name: SEO AI Bot

With Sketch Logo AI, you can personalize your designs and create AI arts like in Midjourney without needing advanced design or drawing skills. This tool helps you save time and effort when creating digital arts such as AI logos, AI tattoos, and AI illustrations.

agents.name: PageOn.AI
agents.shortDescription: AI presentation and media tool
agents.longDescription:
PageOn.AI is an AI-powered tool that facilitates the creation of engaging and influential new media content. It provides solutions primarily to content creators, self-media professionals, office professionals, educators, trainers, and students.

The tool's main offerings include transforming ideas into visually stunning slides via AI and creating compelling narratives through AI-driven storytelling.

It structures presentations, generates engaging scripts, and even offers generated voice narration to amplify the user's content. It an ideal tool for those looking for innovative ways to present content.

It involves no necessity for design skills as it's user-friendly interface and AI-powered tools streamline the creation of professional-look
keyFeatures:
Comprehensive Search Source: Generate more relevant content during outline creation by specifying external sources like Reddit and YouTube/ or integrating your personal database,
AI-Driven Storytelling: Create and search simultaneously with AI-backed citations; every slide includes reliable sources,
Efficient Editing Tools: Use drag-and-drop functionality and switch themes with a single click,

The chatbot handles various tasks, such as engaging with fans and delivering personalized messages, enabling creators to optimize their time and resources.

agents.name: Autopilot Shorts
agents.shortDescription: AI-powered faceless video shorts generator, no video editing skills needed.
agents.longDescription:
Autopilot Shorts is an AI tool designed for generating faceless video shorts. It allows users to create unique videos automatically, using advanced technologies such as GPT-4 and Claude Sonnet.

The tool eliminates the need for video editing skills, making it accessible for anyone looking to enhance their online presence. Users can customize various elements of the video such as the script, title, and background music, ensuring that each creation aligns with their vision.

The platform supports content scheduling for TikTok and YouTube with a single click. Autopilot Shorts focuses on user convenience by offering features like video length selection, customizable AI voices, and a built-in NSFW filter to ensure safety and compliance.
keyFeatures: Always Unique Content: We use latest AI technologies like GPT-4 & Claude Sonnet to ensure unique videos are produced, even on the same topic.
Customisable Art Styles: Choose from a variety of art styles to create your perfect video short. No drawing skills needed.

AI Image Editor: AI Image Editor allows you to fix inconsistencies by regenerating the images to your liking. We use the latest image AI technology to generate images that are unique, visually appealing & copyright-free.
Set and Forget: Schedule videos to TikTok & Youtube with one click, and let us handle the rest.
useCases: Content Creators: Automatically generate and publish engaging video shorts for social media platforms without needing video editing skills.
Social Media Managers: Efficiently produce and schedule multiple video shorts for different channels with automated posting capabilities.
YouTubers & TikTokers: Create consistent, high-quality faceless video content while maintaining a regular posting schedule.
Digital Marketers: Scale video content marketing efforts by generating multiple unique video shorts with minimal manual intervention.
agents.tags: ai video, faceless videos, ai shorts, video shorts, shorts generator, ai clips, faceless clips
